app

Class SNIDApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.SNIDApp

  • public class SNIDApp
extends java.lang.Object
    SNIDApp represents an object that knows how to manage data.

        Adds a new citizen to the system using the specified gender, year of birth, first name, middle name, last name. .
        Parameters:
        gender - - the citizen's gender.
        yob - - the citizen's year of birth.
        fName - - the first name of the citizen.
        mName - - the middle name of the citizen.
        lName - - the last name of the citizen.

        Parameters:
        id - - the citizen's id.
        father - - the id number for the citizen's father.
        mother - - the id number for the citizen's mother.

        Parameters:
        id - - the citizen's id number.
        st - - the citizen's street address.
        tn - - the citizen's town or city.
        pa - - the citizen's parish or county.
        c - - the citizen's country.

      • search

        public java.lang.String search(java.lang.String key)
        Searches for a citizen using the specified id number.
        Parameters:
        key - - the id number of the citizen.
        Returns:
        A formatted String containing id, gender, first name, middle name, last name (in that order).

      • search

        public java.lang.String[] search(java.lang.String firstName,
                                 java.lang.String lastName)
        Searches for one or more citizens having the specified last name.
        Parameters:
        firstName - - the first name of the citizen.
        lastName - - the last name of the citizen.
        Returns:
        An array of formatted Strings containing id, gender, first name, middle name, last name (in that order).
